WRITING.TITLE: Totalwarhammer: Free DLC not downloadable?
WRITING.TEXT:
Ok this seems to be a weird redirect issue.
I recently got the humble bundle and am enjoying warhammer total war.
I go to download the free dlc's from the steam page and it launches the game.
If I am in game on the main menu, it will prompt me to add DLC's which is fine, I go to add them and it opens up a steam browser window which asks if I have steam installed to DL the dlc's.
Clicking on the "steam is installed" button seems to do a whole bunch of nothing.
What the fuck is happening here?
Also, which paid DLC's are worth buying in your opinion?
Saw some while I was at my friends place in Hornsby. Roughly the same size. Crazy storm came and went in around 30 mins.
